title: Adani Electricity used renewable source to supply four hours of power to Mumbai on Diwali day
description: Mumbai is currently struggling to check pollution level and improve air quality. A bulk of the power supplied to the financial capital comes from adjoining areas, while the state authorities have recently asked a rival power generation company to halve the emission of particulate matter from its plant to help reduce pollution.
